name: Dark Seer
title: Ish'Kafel
lore: Fast when he needs to be, and with a mind cunning and deadly, Ish'Kafel earned his title of Dark Seer.

vacuum.name: Vacuum
vacuum.description: Drags all enemies in an area to a target point, dealing damage.

ionShell.name: Ion Shell
ionShell.description: Surrounds a unit with a rotating shield of ions that damages nearby enemies.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: Charges a target allied unit with energy, granting them maximum movement speed for a short time.

wallOfReplica.name: Wall of Replica
wallOfReplica.description: Creates a wall that slows enemies and creates illusions of enemy heroes who pass through.
